## Current position

Post-Doctoral researcher at [UMR Géographie-cités](https://www.parisgeo.cnrs.fr) and [Deezer](www.deezer.com) [Research Team](https://research.deezer.com/), within the [RECORDS](https://records.huma-num.fr/) project.

## Bio

Robin Cura is a Doctor in Geography, with a PhD thesis focused on quantitative geography, agent-based modelling and spatial data visualization.
With a geographical information engineering scholarship, he's interested in the development and dissemination of quantitative methods for geographic data science and to the use of exploratory and visual spatual-data analysis.

## Education
